#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define FL(a) memset(a, 0, sizeof a);
#define pi(a) cout <<  a << endl;
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define pis(n) printf("%d ",n);
#define FREP(b) for(int i=0;i<b;i++)
#define REP(a,b,c) for(int a=b;a<c;a++)
typedef pair<int,int> ii;
typedef long long LL;
/*
struct data{
};
bool operator < (const data &a1, const data &a2){
}
*/
LL poww(LL base, LL p){
    LL res = 1;
    FREP(p){
        res = res*base;
    }
    return res;
}
int main(){
    int tc;
    si(tc);
    string st;
    map<char, LL> store;
    while(tc--){
        cin >> st;
        store.clear();
        int cnt = 0;
        for(int i = 0; i < st.size(); i++){
            if(i == 0)
                store[st[i]] = 1;
            else if(!store.count(st[i])) store[st[i]] = cnt++;
            if(cnt == 1) cnt = 2;
        }
        LL base = store.size(), ans = 0;
        if(base == 1) base++;
        for(int i = 0; i < st.size(); i++){
            ans += store[st[i]]*poww(base, st.size() - i - 1);
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
